artist: Artist: Utagawa Sadahide; Author: Ohara Chikudō; Carver: Nakamura Shuntai; Publisher: Gunhōdō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: book with bound edges on right side; light blue cover with threaded spine; yellow, vertical band on left with Japanese characters; inner pages alternate images of birds, text in Japanese characters, forest scenes, fish, turtles and shells
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Illustrated Reference Book of Photographs of All the Universe, Vol. 2 (complete)
